channel.title: Java Applet
channel.description:
Hey guys, sorry about all the nooby questions I've been asking but I've got like 3 weeks of Java under my belt, and I'm nearly finished my first program which is a Java Chat. Any way, I've made every thing I need, except my Applet. I technically have made it, but I haven't made a Main Method. Everything else works, it compiles, just doesn't open. Anyway, I'll post my applet code and could someone please be kind enough to help me make the main method (this is the first java applet I've ever made, so I don't really know how).
http://www.pastebin.ca/485967.

item.title: Java Applet
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Use the code from kupo as your html page to load the class file. If it is extending applet and has the proper voids, it should work.

Unless, you are looking to run a Jar as an applet?

Read full topic

item.title: Java Applet
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

I just made an html page [<> tags], and put in tags to show it.

[code]

APPLET NAME

HEADER?

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Java Applet
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

You can’t “run” an applet. You need to open it with appletviewer, or make the main method emulate a webbrowser by making a frame, adding the applet, start, run, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Applet
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
